description:
Colgate Optic White Pro Series Electric Power Toothbrush starts whitening from day 1^. The electric toothbrush has dual brushing modes, multi-directional sonic vibrations and a rechargeable battery that lasts up to 10 days*.

Experience a powerful yet gentle clean with the Colgate Optic White Pro Series Whitening Electric Toothbrush with dual brushing modes. Starts whitening from day 1^.

The Colgate ProClinical 500R Whitening Electric Toothbrush with dual brushing modes features 30,000 strokes per minute for a daily clean and 20,000 strokes per minute for a gentle clean. It has multi-directional sonic vibrations, a quiet design and is easy to control. The rechargeable battery lasts up to 10 days* and comes with a travel case for convenience on the go.

Pack contents include:
- 1 x Red Rechargeable toothbrush
- 1 x Whitening replaceable brush head
- 1 x Travel case
- 1 x Charger (AU plug)

Features of the teeth whitening replaceable brush head:
1. Compact head to clean back teeth
2. Spiral bristles help remove surface stains
3. Soft rubber strips polish teeth
4. Soft, thin-tipped bristles sweep along gum line
5. Tongue and cheek cleaner helps remover odour causing bacteria

For optimal care, replace your brush head every 3 months and visit your dentist at least twice a year.

^by removing surface stains. Results may vary.
* when brushing twice daily.

ELECTRIC TOOTHBRUSH: Colgate Optic White Pro Series Teeth Whitening Electric Powered toothbrush has dual brushing modes and multidirectional sonic vibrations

START WHITENING FROM DAY 1^: Spiral bristles help remove surface stains and rubber strips polish your teeth (Results may vary)

SOFT BRISTLES: Soft, thin-tipped bristles sweep along gum line for a gentle clean

TRAVEL CASE: Pack includes a convenient travel case, so you can keep with your oral care routine when you are travelling

RECHARGEABLE BATTERY: that lasts up to 10 days (when brushing twice daily), AU charger included.
name: Colgate Proclinical 500r Whitening Sonic Electric Toothbrush 1 Pack
